reasons.label: Reduced instalment income
reasons.hint: Provide year-to-date management accounts showing the decline in instalment income.

reasons.label: Large deductible expense
reasons.hint: Attach evidence of the deductible capital expenditure and its timing.

reasons.label: New business with lower profits
reasons.hint: Upload business plan or forecast demonstrating the lower taxable income.

safe_harbour.pass_reason: Variation satisfies the 85% safe harbour threshold.
safe_harbour.fail_reason: Variation falls outside the 85% safe harbour threshold and may attract penalties.
safe_harbour.calculation_hint: Ensure varied instalments cover at least 85% of the baseline amount or reduce by no more than 15%.
